tool_description: Experience boundless connectivity with the D7API Gateway, connecting you to a vast messaging network. Now with Viber integration, enjoy seamless communication and stay connected like never before.
name: D7 Viber
title: D7 Viber

api_list.name: Check Balance
api_list.description: Retrieve details about your D7API account's current balance.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://d7-viber.p.rapidapi.com/messages/v1/balance"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "d7-viber.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

detail.message: It looks like your requests were failed due to a missing or invalid 'Access Token'. Sign up at https://app.d7networks.com and create an authentication token in the developer section.

api_list.name: Get Message Status
api_list.description: Retrieve the delivery status of Viber messages that were sent earlier.

detail.message: It looks like your requests were failed due to a missing or invalid 'Access Token'. Sign up at https://app.d7networks.com and create an authentication token in the developer section.

api_list.name: Send Viber Message
api_list.description: D7's Viber Messaging API is designed to meet a wide range of use cases and can be seamlessly integrated into any system. With this API, you can effortlessly implement single Viber messages or personalized batch Viber messages, catering to your specific needs.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://d7-viber.p.rapidapi.com/viber/v1/send"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "d7-viber.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
